comment: He didn't start the fire. It was always burning, Since the world's been turning. He didn't start the fire. No he didn't light it,But he tried to fight it
amr:
# ::snt He didn't start the fire. It was always burning, Since the world's been turning. He didn't start the fire. No he didn't light it,But he tried to fight it
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / start-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (h / he)
            :ARG1 (f / fire))
      :snt2 (b / burn-01
            :ARG1 (f2 / fire)
            :time (a / always)
            :time (s2 / since
                  :op1 (t / turn-02
                        :ARG1 (w / world))))
      :snt3 (s3 / start-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (h2 / he)
            :ARG1 (f3 / fire))
      :snt4 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (l / light-04
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (h3 / he)
                  :ARG1 (f4 / fire))
            :ARG2 (t2 / try-01
                  :ARG0 h3
                  :ARG1 (f5 / fight-01
                        :ARG0 h3
                        :ARG1 f4))))
